mapper.select: select * from vam_bcate order by catecode

SELECT bookId,bookName, ( SELECT authorName FROM vam_author WHERE vam_author.authorId = vam_book.authorId ) authorName, authorId, publeYear, publisher, cateCode, bookPrice, bookStock, bookDiscount, bookIntro, bookContents, regDate, updateDate FROM vam_book WHERE bookId=#{bookId}
